text: Egha aning Atalian ikegha kurim inigha uamategha Antioghɨn nguibamɨn ghu. Nguibar kamra, aning kagh faragha ikezɨ, Antioghɨn itir Kraisɨn adarazi aning isa Godɨn agharim ganɨga ghaze, Godɨn apangkuvim aning ko ikɨtɨ aning ingangarir kam damuam. Ezɨ aning ingangarir kam gamua iza datɨrɨghɨn anegɨvagha, uamategha Antioghɨn ghu.
